text: in a small community in the Pacific Northwest a dynamic company is growing this company has served the equipment dealer market for 30 years they did it by following their principles by being the best and by being honest to their customers d is technology-driven people focus yeah we push a really high used inventory turn to our dealerships one of the ways we do it well very aggressive marketing weekly ads statewide or internet presence we try to push real hard and once a year at least once a year we have a used equipment auction we've been running used equipment auctions through our dealership for many many years it's a way of freeing up some capital and getting rid of that you knows cleaning out the yard make room for new stuff we generally manage the the auctions ourselves we hire good auctioneers we Clerk them ourselves and cashier em ourselves and so it takes some of the expense out I like to control the advertising myself i doing auctions so many years kind of know what I think our market is and overall it gives us an opportunity to get a real good handle on what use equipment values are sometimes we lose money sometimes we make money it's all part of the deal here but but I'm a firm believer in the auction process in a small community in the Pacific Northwest a dynamic company is growing this company has served the equipment dealer market for 30 years they did it by following their principles by being the best and by being honest to their customers D is technology driven people focus
